General.Name: T.K.S. Technologies Public Company Limited
General.Description: T.K.S. Technologies Public Company Limited manufactures and sells business and continuous paper forms, securities printing products, and other printing and continuous labels primarily in Thailand, Asia, and internationally. Its products include cheques, passbooks, certificates, coupons & gift vouchers, tax and postage stamps, loyalty/CRM stamps, business and commercial forms, bank statements, notices for debt payment, invoices for various utility bills, commercial and security labels, plastic cards, digital printing, and office supplies and papers. The company also provides examination management, other security document, warehouse & fulfillment, and packaging solutions. In addition, it is involved in the provision of information technology and software consultancy services; warehouse management; and investment activities. The company was founded in 1954 and is based in Samut Sakhon, Thailand.
General.Address: 30/88, Moo 1, Chetsadawithi Road, Samut Sakhon, Thailand, 74000
